description: Notification represents the incomplete collection of file in a collection period.

event.Summary: File $v1 collection incomplete during collection period

description: Bulk file name.
If you specify a path in the file name, this file is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileName

description: Notification represents the data collection resumes itself to normal in latter
collection period.
Bulk file name.
If you specify a path in the file name, this file is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileName

description: Notification represents connecting to URL fails in file transfer.

event.Summary: URL connection failed in file $v1 transfer

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatURLConnectionFail HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferPrimaryURL s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferSecondaryURL s EXAMPLE

description: Bulk file name.
If you specify a path in the file name, this file is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileName

description: The primary URL to transfer the bulk file to NMS.
It should be in the forms of below:
ftp://user:password@host/folder/bulkstat1
tftp://10.1.0.1/tftpboot/user/bulkstat1
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferPrimaryURL

description: The secondary URL to transfer the bulk file to NMS.
It should be in the forms of below:
ftp://user:password@host/folder/bulkstat1
tftp://10.1.0.1/tftpboot/user/bulkstat1
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferSecondaryURL

description: Notification represents the connection to URL resumes in file transfer.

event.Summary: URL connection resumed in file $v1 transfer

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatURLConnectionResume HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferPrimaryURL s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferSecondaryURL s EXAMPLE

description: Bulk file name.
If you specify a path in the file name, this file is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileName

description: The primary URL to transfer the bulk file to NMS.
It should be in the forms of below:
ftp://user:password@host/folder/bulkstat1
tftp://10.1.0.1/tftpboot/user/bulkstat1
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferPrimaryURL

description: The secondary URL to transfer the bulk file to NMS.
It should be in the forms of below:
ftp://user:password@host/folder/bulkstat1
tftp://10.1.0.1/tftpboot/user/bulkstat1
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileTransferSecondaryURL

description: Notification represents the transfer file is discarded automatically
because of tranfer failure.

event.Summary: File $v1 automatically discarded due to transfer failure

description: Bulk file name.
If you specify a path in the file name, this file is invalid.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileName

description: The object specifies the latest successful
collecting time stamp when the file transferred unsuccessfully.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BULKSTAT-MIB::hwBulkStatDefineFileLastTransferFailTime
